alert.note: Alert for Coastal Ocean; Eastern Monmouth; Ocean; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 07 at 7:49AM EST until January 07 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near shorelines of back bays and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Monmouth and Ocean Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...High tide has passed on the Oceanfront, and no additonal tidal flooding is expected today. However, water levels on back bays and tidal water ways, including Barnegat Bay and the Shrewsbury River remain in minor flood levels. Tide levels in these locations are expected to slowly recede through late morning into early afternoon. &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Ocean; Eastern Monmouth; Ocean; Western Monmouth
